Tutorial¶

Sampling ARGs¶

import msprime

sample_ts = msprime.simulate(sample_size=10, Ne=10000,
                                        length=1e4,
                                        mutation_rate=1e-8,
                                        recombination_rate=1e-8,
                                        random_seed=2)
print(sample_ts.num_trees,
      sample_ts.num_nodes)

The output of this code is:
